#
# Auto-generated cmake build file for guunits
#
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
project(guunits C CXX)
enable_testing()
find_package(gu_util CONFIG REQUIRED)
include( GNUInstallDirs )
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED True)
add_compile_definitions()
include_directories($<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/./ $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guunits> ../../../Common $<BUILD_INTERFACE:/include/gu_util> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include/gu_util> /usr/local/include/gu_util /usr/local/include)
link_directories(/usr/local/lib)
add_library(libguunits SHARED CartesianCoordinate.cc CartesianEdge.cc Coordinate.cc Edge.cc guunits.c)
add_library(libguunitsStatic STATIC CartesianCoordinate.cc CartesianEdge.cc Coordinate.cc Edge.cc guunits.c)
set_target_properties(libguunits PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME guunits)
set_target_properties(libguunitsStatic PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME guunits)
set_property(TARGET libguunits PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 1)
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_SKIP_BUILD_RPATH FALSE)
set(CMAKE_BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_RPATH FALSE)
set(CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH TRUE)
set(CMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib;/usr/local/lib")
target_include_directories(libguunits INTERFACE $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>/./ $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guunits>)
target_include_directories(libguunits PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}> $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_INSTALL_INCLUDEDIR}/guunits>)
target_link_libraries(libguunits gu_util)
include(CMakePackageConfigHelpers)
configure_package_config_file(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Config.cmake.in "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guunitsConfig.cmake" INSTALL_DESTINATION "lib/cmake/guunits" NO_SET_AND_CHECK_MACRO NO_CHECK_REQUIRED_COMPONENTS_MACRO )
write_basic_package_version_file( "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guunitsConfigVersion.cmake" VERSION "1.0" COMPATIBILITY AnyNewerVersion )
install(TARGETS libguunits libguunitsStatic DESTINATION lib EXPORT guunits)
install(FILES CartesianCoordinate.h CartesianEdge.h Coordinate.h Edge.h guunits.h DESTINATION include/guunits)
install(EXPORT guunits FILE guunits.cmake DESTINATION lib/cmake/guunits )
install(FILES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guunitsConfig.cmake ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guunitsConfigVersion.cmake DESTINATION lib/cmake/guunits )
export(EXPORT guunits FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/guunits.cmake" )
